item.title: The Between - Shadow of the Fae Queen - One seat open
item.dc:creator: @OnlyAnAlligator
item.description:
@OnlyAnAlligator wrote:

Hey there!
I have a seat open for a session of my run of The Between.
Find links and more information in the original post!

The Between: Shadow of the Fae Queen Gauntlet Calendar
This is a run of The Between going from September through November, focusing on the new Titania mastermind threat. The Between is a tabletop roleplaying game about a group of mysterious monster hunters in Victorian-era London. They are residents of a place called Hargrave House, and their job is to investigate and neutralize monstrous threats terrorizing the city—threats that Scotland Yard won’t or can’t handle themselves. As the story progresses, they become aware of the plans of a Moriarty…

Read full topic
